Ketua DPRD Minta Draf KUA-PPAS, Sekda DKI: Mana yang Belum Dikasih?
07 Nov 2019, 14:01 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - Sekda DKI Jakarta Saefullah memastikan sudah menyerahkan draf pembahasan KUA-PPAS ke DPRD DKI pada 5 Juli lalu. Penegasan ini menanggapi pernyataan Ketua DPRD DKI Jakarta Prasetio Edi Marsudi yang mengaku belum mendapat draf KUA-PPAS.
"Saya cek Pak Sekwan (Sekretaris Dewan) itu yang kita kirim apa sudah diterima pimpinan? Dijawab di WA-nya sama saya, 'Sudah Pak, Sudah saya berikan ke pimpinan (DPRD) dalam bentuk softcopy, hardcopy semua di ruang ketua'. Semuanya ada satu boks disimpan, sudah kita berikan. Anggota juga sudah kita kasih. Ya mana yang belum dikasih?" ujar Saefullah kepada wartawan di Balai Kota DKI Jakarta, Jalan Medan Merdeka Selatan, Jakarta Pusat, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Saefullah mengaku saat pembahasan ada perubahan rencana anggaran untuk 2020. Awalnya dianggarkan Rp 95 triliun turun menjadi Rp 89 triliun. Revisi itu, menurut Saefullah, hanya disampaikan dalam bentuk kertas kerja.
"Kalau kemarin waktu paparan saya pertama itu kan kertas kerja dinamika fluktuatif, turun naiknya ekonomi di Jakarta ini dalam kurung waktu 6 bulan, dan prediksi kita di 2020 ada kecenderungan turun naik, landai dan kita sampaikan bahwa ini kertas kerja kita seperti ini silakan dibahas, di komisi, di Banggar besar dibahas," papar Saefullah.
Karenanya Pemprov DKI Jakarta tidak mengirim draf perubahan KUA-PPAS pada Oktober 2019.
"Tapi yang kita kirim secara resmi dokumen kita ya hanya satu, nggak ada dokumen lain," kata Saefullah.
Saefullah membantah soal Pemprov DKI menyerahkan dokumen beberapa menit sebelum pembahasan. Baginya, hal yang dibahas adalah rencana KUA PPAS yang telah diserahkan.
"Semalam saya agak kecewa ada yang bilang statment kita ini, birokrat ini selalu kasih bahan pembahasan itu last minute terus, ya siapa yang kasi last minute, orang barang itu kita sudah kasi dari tanggal 5 Juli," ucap Saefullah.
Sebelumnya, Ketua DPRD DKI Jakarta Prasetio Edi Marsudi mengaku tak pernah mendapat draf revisi KUA-PPAS 2020. Awalnya Prasetio berkomentar soal rencana anggaran yang disorot publik karena ada beberapa nilai aneh.
Prasetio menyebut tidak pernah menerima salinan utuh revisi KUA-PPAS yang dimasukkan pada Oktober 2019.
"Jadi, kita minta Pak Anies jangan menyalahkan pemerintahan sebelumnya. Koreksi dulu. Kalau saya lihat, ini kan perencanaan dari Bappeda, saya sebetulnya sampai hari ini belum mendapatkan KUA-PPAS 2020 yang direvisi (Gubernur DKI Jakarta) Pak Anies," ujar Prasetio kepada wartawan Kamis (31/10).
Sementara itu, Wakil Ketua DPRD DKI Jakarta Zita Anjani mengaku pembahasan rencana anggaran tidak maksimal. Soalnya, penyerahan materi pembahasan rencana anggaran oleh Pemprov DKI dirasa terlalu mendadak dan tak transparan.
"(Rencana anggaran) lem Aibon itu kecil. Banyak lagi transparansi yang kurang. Contoh rapat komisi, bahan-bahan yang akan kita bahas, jumlah miliaran, baru dikasih H-1 menit," ucap Zita di gedung DPRD DKI Jakarta, Jalan Kebon Sirih, Jakarta Pusat, Selasa (5/11).

DPRD Chairwoman Asks KUA-PPAS Draft, DKI Regional Secretary: Which Has Not Been Given?
Nov 7 2019, 14:01 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - Secretary of DKI Jakarta Saefullah confirmed that he had submitted the draft discussion of KUA-PPAS to the DKI DPRD on July 5. This affirmation responds to the statement of the Chairperson of DKI Jakarta DPRD Prasetio Edi Marsudi who claimed not to have received a KUA-PPAS draft.
"I checked the Pak Sekwan (Secretary of the Council) that we sent, did the leadership receive it? Answered on the WA by me, 'Yes sir, I have given it to the leadership (DPRD) in the form of soft copies, hard copies of everything in the chairman's room'. there is one box stored, we have given it. We have also given members. Yes, which has not been given? " Saefullah said to reporters at DKI Jakarta City Hall, Jalan Medan Merdeka Selatan, Central Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019).
Saefullah claimed during the discussion there was a change in the budget plan for 2020. Initially budgeted at Rp 95 trillion fell to Rp 89 trillion. The revision, according to Saefullah, was only conveyed in the form of working papers.
"If yesterday's first time my exposure was the fluctuating dynamics working paper, the ups and downs of the economy in Jakarta within a period of 6 months, and our prediction in 2020 there is a tendency to go up and down, sloping and we submit that this is our working paper like this please discuss, at the commission, a large Banggar was discussed, "Saefullah explained.
Therefore the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government did not send a draft amendment to the KUA-PPAS in October 2019.
"But we only send one official document, there are no other documents," Saefullah said.
Saefullah denied that the DKI Provincial Government submitted documents a few minutes before the discussion. For him, the thing discussed was the KUA PPAS plan that had been submitted.
"Last night I was a bit disappointed that someone said our statement, this bureaucrat always gave us discussion material last minute and then, yeah who gave it last minute, we already gave it to people from July 5," Saefullah said.
Previously, the Chairperson of DKI Jakarta DPRD Prasetio Edi Marsudi claimed he had never received a draft revision of the KUA-PPAS 2020. Initially Prasetio commented on the budget plan that was highlighted by the public because there were some strange values.
Prasetio said that he had never received a full copy of the revised KUA-PPAS that was submitted in October 2019.
"So, we ask Mr. Anies not to blame the previous government. Correction first. If I see, this is a plan from Bappeda, I actually haven't got the revised KUA-PPAS 2020 (Governor of DKI Jakarta) Mr. Anies," Prasetio told reporters Thursday (10/31).
Meanwhile, Deputy Chairperson of DKI Jakarta DPRD Zita Anjani admitted that discussion of the budget plan was not optimal. The thing is, the submission of material for the discussion of budget plans by the DKI Provincial Government is felt to be too sudden and not transparent.
"(Budget plan) Aibon glue is small. Much less transparency. Examples of commission meetings, materials that we will discuss, the number of billions, only given H-1 minute," said Zita in the Jakarta DPRD building, Jalan Kebon Sirih , Central Jakarta, Tuesday (5/11).
